document_data.name: Malanthor Drymm
document_data.mainbody: '''Malanthor Drymm''' was a male [[wizard]] who was one of the [[magelord]]s of [[Athalantar]] and was killed in [[Elminster Aumar]]'s insurrection.
document_data.History: He was an arrogant and very self-confident magelord. He was one of the magelords forcibly summoned to the spell-battle in [[240 DR]] in [[Ithboltar]]'s tower in Athalgard and died there.
